info.title: HCL Commerce Marketplace Sellers
info.description: Fetch active marketplace sellers for a store.

externalDocs.description: This service provides an API to fetch a list of active marketplace sellers for a store.

get.summary: Get active marketplace sellers for a store.
get.description: Get active marketplace sellers for a store.

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: The return language for marketplace seller name and description. The store default language is used if missing.

200.description: The sellers with status details are retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad request. The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

401.description: Not authenticated. The user session is not valid.

403.description: The user is not authorized to perform the specified request.

404.description: The specified resource could not be found.

500.description: Internal server error. For details, see the server log files.

id.description: The unique numeric ID for identifying the organization.

name.description: The display name for specified language.

description.description: The short description for specified language.

status.description:
Status of the marketplace seller organization. Available values:
* 1 - The organization is in Active state.
* 2 - The organization is in Deactivated state.
* 3 - The organization is in Suspended state.
* 4 - The organization is in Terminated state.

onlineStatus.description:
Online Status of the marketplace seller organization. Available values:
* 1 - The organization is in Online state.
* 0 - The organization is in Offline state.
